## Runtime.IReadOnlyValidatingResourceTree.getBranchById() method

Gets a branch node by its string ResourceId path, validating the input.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBranchById(id: string): Result<IReadOnlyResourceTreeBranch<T>>;
```
